title: Rapturous Joy
verses: Hark! that shout of rapturous joy, Bursting
Hark! the trumpet's awful voice, Sounds across Heav'n and
earth from yonder cloud! Jesus comes! and through the
broad through sea and land; Let his people now rejoice
Rise ye saints, he comes for
sky, Angels tell their joy aloud.
joice, Their redemption is at hand.

metadata.musical_notation: Present with treble and bass clef
metadata.theological_significance: Celebrates the rapturous joy and trumpet call announcing Christ's second coming
